doc.field: Series II contains the mss. of Paulson's translations of Henrik Ibsen, August Strindberg and other Scandinavian authors. Subseries A contains Paulson's translations of Ibsen, as well as miscellaneous Ibsen ephemera collected by Paulson; the ephemera includes playbills, postcards and criticism. Series II, Subseries B contains Paulson's mss. translations of Strindberg; subseries C contains the same material, this time in drafts prepared for publication. Subseries D contains Paulson's translations of Vilhelm Moberg, Knut Hamsun, Gustav Geijerstam and other Scandinavian authors. Subseries E contains miscellaneous manuscripts.
